EmailTemplate.description: Notify PO of Project Stage and to fil in Expected start date
EmailTemplate.name: Notify PO of Project Stage and to fil in Expected start date
EmailTemplate.subject: Please fill in the Expected start date for Project {!Project_Tracker__c.Project_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Project_Tracker__c.ProjectOwner__c},
The Project {!Project_Tracker__c.Project_Name__c} is in stage {!Project_Tracker__c.Status__c}
Please fill in Expected start date
Thanks,
{!Project_Tracker__c.Product_Manager__c}
